message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality item that's worth a lot to me. I'm willing to let it go for $9000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6000. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make sure I get a good deal too. I'm willing to meet you halfway - I can do $7500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. Can you try to do $6500?
I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession - I can do $7000. That's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Can you try to do $6800?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $6900. That's the lowest I can go. I'm willing to meet you at this price. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my limit too, Alice. I can do $6700. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $6700 and $6900. I can do $6800. That's my final offer. What do you think?
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $6700 and $6800. I can do $6730. That's my final offer.
